result.eng: On both sides of the river.
result.html: ar dhá thaobh na habhannOn both sides of the river.
result.ponchtml: ar ḋá ṫaoḃ na haḃannOn both sides of the river.

result.eng: Both men and women were there.
result.ga: bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.orig: bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.html: bhí idir fhir agus mhná annBoth men and women were there.
result.ponchtml: ḃí idir ḟir agus ṁná annBoth men and women were there.

result.eng: They are fluent in both languages.
result.ga: tá siad líofa sa dá theanga
result.orig: tá siad líofa sa dá theanga
result.html: tá siad líofa sa dá theangaThey are fluent in both languages.
result.ponchtml: tá siad líofa sa dá ṫeangaThey are fluent in both languages.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.html: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ponchtml: tá trúpaí ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.orig: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.html: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
